results.title: Why does my audio says that no output device found? - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: So can pls anyone help me? ;-; i also saw this in my device manager| Hi archie.c I am Dave, I will help you with this. 1 The best first option is to go to the support page for your PC on the manufacturers website, then from there, download and install the version of Audio card device drivers they recommend. 2 Then, in the Settings... Then restart.

descriptions.content: So can pls anyone help me? ;-; i also saw this in my device manager| Hi archie.c I am Dave, I will help you with this. 1 The best first option is to go to the support page for your PC on the manufacturers website, then from there, download and install the version of Audio card device drivers they recommend. 2 Then, in the Settings... Then restart.

results.title: missing "Paste Formatting" ribbon button in Excel 2010 - Microsoft Q&A
results.description: In 2007 its between Paste Picture and Paste Formula gsnu201005| Yup. Definitely not there in 2010.| Be sure that you have select "All commands" in the dropdown It is there in 2010 Regards Ron de Bruin http://www.rondebruin.nl/tips.htm "CloudWarrior" wrote in message news:*** Email address is removed for privacy ***. Yup..
